TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RibbonApplicationMenu extends System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton

summary.span: 表示在 控件中使用的应用程序菜单。

span.span: Represents an Application Menu that is used in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个功能区都包含一个应用程序菜单作为功能区中的第一个选项卡。Every ribbon includes an Application Menu as the first tab in the ribbon. 其他功能区选项卡包含用于处理文档内容的控件。Other ribbon tabs contain controls for working with the document content. 与此相反，"应用程序" 菜单显示用于处理文件的命令菜单。In contrast, the Application Menu presents a menu of commands for working with the file. 例如，传统上的 "文件" 菜单中的命令用于创建、打开、保存和打印文件。Examples include commands that traditionally go in the File menu to create, open, save, and print files. 它还用于访问程序选项和 "退出" 命令。It is also used to access program options and the Exit command. 下图显示了功能区控件的 "应用程序" 菜单。The following illustration shows the Application Menu for a ribbon control. ![功能区应用程序菜单](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "功能区应用程序菜单")![Ribbon Application Menu](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "Ribbon Application Menu") 可以承载 和 对象。The can host and objects. "应用程序" 菜单还具有*辅助窗格*和 "*页脚" 窗格*，可托管其他内容。The Application Menu also has an *auxiliary pane* and a *footer pane* that can host additional content. 属性承载 ，通常用于显示最近使用的文档的列表。The property hosts a and is typically used to display a list of recent documents. 属性通常承载允许访问程序选项和 Exit 命令的按钮。The property typically hosts buttons that enable access to program options and the Exit command. 以下列表显示了应用程序菜单中的典型元素层次结构。The following list shows the typical hierarchy of elements in an Application Menu. - - - - - - - - ## Examples 下面的示例显示了前面所述的 "应用程序" 菜单。The following example shows the Application Menu as illustrated previously. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_Snippets#AppMenuFull](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_snippets/cs/ribbonwindow1.xaml#appmenufull)]

span.span: Gets or sets the content of the Application Menu auxiliary pane.

value.span: “应用程序菜单”辅助窗格的内容。

span.span: The content of the Application Menu auxiliary pane.
The registered default is .

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅 [Dependency Property Value Precedence（依赖项属性值优先级）](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks "应用程序" 菜单具有可托管其他内容的*辅助窗格*。The Application Menu has an *auxiliary pane* that can host additional content. 属性承载 ，通常用于显示最近使用的文档的列表。The property hosts a and is typically used to display a list of recent documents. 下图显示了功能区控件的 "应用程序" 菜单。The following illustration shows the Application Menu for a ribbon control. 辅助窗格承载最近使用的文档的列表。The auxiliary pane hosts a list of recent documents. ![功能区应用程序菜单](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "功能区应用程序菜单")![Ribbon Application Menu](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "Ribbon Application Menu") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例显示了之前所示的应用程序菜单的辅助窗格内容。The following example shows the auxiliary pane content of the Application Menu shown previously. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_Snippets#AppMenuAuxPane](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_snippets/cs/ribbonwindow1.xaml#appmenuauxpane)]

The registered default is .

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅 [Dependency Property Value Precedence（依赖项属性值优先级）](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定内容的可视化。You use the property to specify the visualization of the content. 如果定义了多个模板，并希望指定逻辑来选择要使用的模板，则使用此属性。If you have more than one template defined and want to specify logic that selects a template to use, then you use this property. 如果设置了 属性，则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if the property is set. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

remarks.format: ## Remarks "应用程序" 菜单具有可托管其他内容的*页脚窗格*。The Application Menu has a *footer pane* that can host additional content. 属性通常承载允许访问程序选项和 Exit 命令的按钮。The property typically hosts buttons that enable access to program options and the Exit command. 下图显示了功能区控件的 "应用程序" 菜单。The following illustration shows the Application Menu for a ribbon control. 页脚窗格承载**退出**按钮。The footer pane hosts an **Exit** button. ![功能区应用程序菜单](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "功能区应用程序菜单")![Ribbon Application Menu](~/add/media/wpfribbon-appmenu.png "Ribbon Application Menu") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例显示了之前所示的应用程序菜单的页脚窗格内容。The following example shows the footer pane content of the Application Menu shown previously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当应用程序代码或内部进程（如重新生成布局处理过程）调用 方法时，均会调用此方法。This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the method.
